examples.example: 老师提问后，同学们纷纷举手抢答。

translate.english: After the teacher asked questions, the students raised their hands one after another to rush to answer.

examples.example: 课堂上，当老师询问谁能解答这个问题时，小明第一个举手。

translate.english: In the classroom, when the teacher asked who could answer this question, Xiaoming was the first to raise his hand.

examples.example: 老师讲完课后询问大家是否理解，很多同学都举手表示已经明白。

translate.english: After the teacher finished the lesson and asked if everyone understood, many students raised their hands to indicate that they had already understood.
